title: Could any Rioter answer me a question?
body:
I ask you this question on twitter,but no one answer me....I will check it again on twitter.
Well,I'm a gamer from China.I've read all the stories about Noxus recently .Noxus attracted me,but I can't get any messages about the cities in Noxus even the capital (maybe I was not careful enough ).So could any Rioter tell me what the cities are in Noxus?Wait...another question... "Noxtoraa (gateway to Noxus in Ur-Nox)" I don't quite understand this sentence even in chinese (I only can get few messages by this sentence) .And Noxtoraa is a kind of gateway,right?
Emm....maybe what I said make you don't understand my means,but I should go to sleep!Because the time is 0:37 in China.

replies.body:
So Noxtoraa is referring to the gateways dotted along the roads leading to the Capital of Noxus. They're called Noxtoraa, because that's how you say "Gateway to Noxus" in their language, Ur-Nox. The Capital itself is referred to as The Immortal Bastion, which is the first citadel that the Noxian tribes conquered when they were beginning to settle down instead of roving the countryside.

Little FYI as well: Demacia recently had it's lore expanded and updated a bit to reflect the current state of affairs. I don't know for sure, but there's a chance that Noxus could be getting an update at some point!
